name: Get daily currency exchange rates in Google Sheets
description: Every day get an actual currency exchange rate of specified currency using Mallabe Currencies. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1AqQ79emIoRzeYaj58xHDDrgQL-7ZEFxkCpBmEX6Ix5c/edit?usp=sharing).
